title: Comic Sans
content:
A long time ago I saw a very very nice modified Comic Sans and I can’t find that font now.

Please Help!
author: Franc isco

comments.content:
In what way?  
Few people, I’m afraid, are allowed to modify Comic Sans, and even fewer, will. There are even those who think you cannot modify Comic sans to look _very_ nice. ;-)

Andreas

Part of me feels it’s heretical to modify such a specimen of typographic wonder.

It’s almost like...like re-designing the Pope’s big funny phallic hat. You probably just shouldn’t?
Just buy a nice font from Blambot or Comicraft.
And burn the Pope’s big funny phallic hat, while you’re at it.

Maybe you’re thinking of Apple Casual?

In any case, do yourself a huge favor and follow James Puckett’s advice.
